# sitecore_project (Resource)

Manages a Sitecore project. This resource allows you to create, update, and delete SitecoreAI projects.

## Example Usage

```hcl
# Create a new Sitecore project
resource "sitecore_project" "example" {
  name        = "My Sitecore Project"
  description = "A project for managing our corporate website"
}

# Reference the project ID in outputs
output "project_id" {
  value = sitecore_project.example.id
}
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `name` - (Required) The name of the project. This must be unique within your SitecoreAI organization.
* `description` - (Optional) The description of the project.

## Attribute Reference

* `id` - (Read-only) The ID of the project. This is generated by SitecoreAI and can be used to reference the project in other resources.

## Import

Sitecore projects can be imported using their ID:

```bash
terraform import sitecore_project.example project-id-here
```

## Notes

* Project names must be unique within your organization
* The project ID is used as a reference for creating environments and other resources
* Deleting a project will permanently remove it and all associated resources
